testsuite.name: CoffeeMachineTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #2
Yes, I can make that amount of coffee (and even 5 more than that) Yes, I can make that amount of coffee (and even 2 more than that)
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
>600 >153 >100 >1 Yes, I can make that amount of coffee (and even 5 more than that)
